attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make Councils responsible to the public for all local services. eg. Maintenance of the roads, pavements, verges, road sweeping, litter etc.. Not private companies who they go into partnership with and in the process pass all their legal responsibilities to the public into the hands of unelected and unacountable commercial organisations.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
